Minimum requirements

For anyone that can't play the game, do this:

1. Install Sleeping Dogs by Skidrow
2. Install Crackfix by Skidrow
3. Install 10 DLC by Skidrow (You can get this on their website)
4. Install Steam (yeah, this was the problem for me - the game somehow requires steam files, no need for profile, just install and update it)
5. Run the game as admin
6. Block the game in firewall
7. Allow buddha.dll access through antivirus (or simply disable it)

I should mention that with the new 10 DLC pack by skidrow, I think they even more fixed the game, no crashes at all (for me at least).

For those of you who couldn't get into the game after pressing 'New Game', here's a simple fix that I figured out by following instructions from suckerP.

1. Download and replace files from this crack http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7550983/Sleeping_Dogs_Limited_Edition_1.4_NEW_UPDATE_FIX-3DM_by_T.F.K in the main directory

2. Download and replace the crack you've previously placed in step one, with this 
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7556674/Sleeping.Dogs.New.Crack.Freeze.Fixed-3DM

3. Now, download the 1.4-1.5 update and overwrite as you did in steps 1-2 with this

@cooljzer

same thing happened to me... i resolved the issue.

If you ran the game the first time by right-clicking and launching as an admin then to access your saved game you need to run the game as admin everytime.

If you launched the game for the first time by just clicking on the game (not right-clicking), then you will find your save by just clicking on the game.

Hope that helps! I was confused as to what happened to my game saved, then i close the game & launched by right clicking and running as admin & I found my save!

To everyone having problems, I completed downloading this torrent and have had no problems whatsoever.

1. Download the fix here http://www.t411.me/torrents/details/?id=4675500

2. Make sure before installing the game your user settings for Windows allow permissions, SET your UAC correctly - it should be on 'Never Notify"

3. Anti-Virus should be disabled - for all those reporting a VIRUS *** well be and say what you want but it's pretty obvious due to the file extention that AV will report a problem ***

4. Mount the torrent using PowerISO and install the game

5. Copy over cracked content from the original Skidrow folder on disk 2

6. Now copy over the downloaded content done in step 1 to the Sleeping Dogs installation directory

7. Launch the game and Njoy!!!

Btw... I'm using Win7 64

Sleeping Dogs has WAY too many different updates, cracks, patches, and fixes. This game is an absolute nightmare and I have been cracking games since I was 15. Here's my instructions to get 1.5 and DLC working.

1) Download this torrent game and install it with HD textures.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7551450/Sleeping_Dogs_Limited_Edition_MULTI_7_CRACKED_NEW_UPDATE_1.4

2)Download this 1.4 update, copy in into the install directory and overwrite.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7547939/3DMGAME-Sleeping.dogs.v1.4.Update-3DM.7z

3)Copy over this 1.4 crack and overwrite.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7547614/Sleeping_Dogs_-_v1.4_-_3DM_Crack_Only

4) Download this 1.5 update and overwrite.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7587843/Sleeping_Dogs_v1.4_to_v1.5_Update_%28_36_MB_%29 

Run the 1.4-1.5.bat file and ignore the errors.

5) To get DLC working download this torrent and copy to Sleeping Dogs folder and overwrite when asked.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7597494/Sleeping_Dogs_v1.5_Crack_with_All_DLC(Working)

6)Open LumaEmu.ini and replace the path for steam_api.dll with the current Sleeping Dogs path.

That's it! I did this exactly and the game launched with no issues!

I know the 1.5 update changes Game.big, but if you want HD textures this is the way to do it. I didn't have any issues so far with slowdown or FPS drops. I did this about 2 weeks ago, so I'm pretty sure those are all the files you need to transfer.
